programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2
programme.desc: When investigating a haunted old hospital Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Schaal. The gang happily invites her to be a part of their mystery solving group and she's ecstatic. She tags along with our gang helping them solve the mystery of the horrible ghost of Dr. Phineas Phrag. More genetically enhanced monster than man he's been lurking in this hospital since it closed down in the 1950s and he threatens to destroy any trespassers who dare set foot in these creepy old wards. Can our gang and Ms. Schaal discover the truth of this haunted hospital before it's too late? More importantly can Kristen Schaal find out how she best fits into our group? So many fun choices - so little time!

Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry – the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the train tracks were moved by Fairy Coco who was tired to having to do all the work for Queen Sparklewings. If no one came to the picnic at all, there'd be no tidying up to do. Fairy Coco tells the Queen that she's very sorry for causing a mess and the Queen tells her that she's sorry too. She didn't mean to make the Fairies do all the work and miss out on the fun! Later, the picnic takes place and everyone helps clear up afterwards. It's much quicker and much more fun if everyone helps out together! Good job Noddy!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tag’s handiness - and one of Lady Lydia’s hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawston’s new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Amber announces that math is the new skill that every hunter must have. Grug cannot seems to grasp the concept and enlists Squawk to help him/Grug and Snoot ban dancing when it causes a rock slide. Eep sets up an underground dance club against the adults' wishes.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Eep joins the Scream-Leading team and starts picking up characteristics of her coach, Meep, much to Ugga's chagrin/Meep kicks Snoot out of the cave for not being a brave hunter. The Croods reluctantly take Snoot in and try to make him into a hunter to get him out of their home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.desc: Tip starts dating Stick, but ruins the relationship when she tries to change him/Tip tries to impress the older kids at her first ninth grade party but, Oh's Boovy behavior embarrasses her

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo takes Beakless under his wing during a battle of snails vs. birds; Chet is Sheriff of a western Turbotown and fights a gang of outlaw crickets.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: While trying to get home from a snowy area north of their crater, the gang meets a lonely but helpful Trux named Snowblazer who helps them navigate.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat's Special Delivery is a very large, very fragile lighthouse bulb, and everything seems to be conspiring to make him break it! Falling timber, an out of control sofa, Bonnie the dog, high winds...! Pat's journey from the sorting office to Pencaster Bay is a minefield of hazards. Waiting for the bulb is lighthouse keeper Chris Beacon and his pet parrot Micawber, both anxious to get the lighthouse working before sundown, and tracking a storm blowing in. Out at sea are Alf and PC Selby, enjoying a day's fishing, until they drift off-course and need the lighthouse to guide them ashore...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky challenges Raa Raa to make a noise with everything in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Will Raa Raa succeed?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry – the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved. With the help of Bumpy and Revs, Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the train tracks were moved by Fairy Coco who was tired to having to do all the work for Queen Sparklewings. If no one came to the picnic at all, there'd be no tidying up to do. Fairy Coco tells the Queen that she's very sorry for causing a mess and the Queen tells her that she's sorry too. She didn't mean to make the Fairies do all the work and miss out on the fun! Later, the picnic takes place and everyone helps clear up afterwards. It's much quicker and much more fun if everyone helps out together! Good job Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress… who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Biggie accidentally destroys a beloved scrapbook, he and Poppy set out to replace it by having a scrapbook-worthy adventure./ CJ Suki and Priscilla embark on a journey to earn Junior Troll Ranger patches for mastering Trolly activities.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippet’s Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, there’s lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - they’re going to have to work together.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
programme.desc: Ik Hyeon is a corrupt customs officer involved in drug dealings and hooks up with mob boss Hyeong Bae to sell drugs. Together they expand the mob business with their own connections and strengths, but when the government declares a war on crime, the two partners get entangled in a web of conspiracy and betrayal.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Extreme Ends

Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Frasier S5 E10 - Where Every Bloke Knows Your Name
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: CSI S3 E18 - Precious Metal
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, every major civilisation has believed in curses and their power to inflict harm. But if curses are real, then what brings them into existence? And how are they triggered?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: After hearing incredible testimony about a UFO crashing on Skinwalker Ranch many years ago, the team makes a shocking discovery inside the rocky Mesa.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: Hungarian professor, Erno Rubik, ignites "Cube Mania" with his 3D puzzle that takes the world by storm. Leslie Scott will stop at nothing to bring an iconic building block board game to market.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The towering obelisks of ancient Egypt weigh hundreds of tonnes and each was carved from a single granite rock. Ancient Astronaut Theorists suggest they may have served a technological purpose.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: While the team uncovers more evidence suggesting the mysterious man-made stone foundation on Lot 5 was purposefully hidden, the Fellowship is zeroing in on the gold in the Money Pit.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Pickle teams up with Jacob, and it's almost like being on vacation. Zak tries to make up for a crucial mistake. Bruce ventures into uncharted territory. Ashley sets her sights on monstrous land gators.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team heads to a target they believe to be the long-lost Marine Sulphur Queen. This massive tanker disappeared in 1963 with a crew of 39 and is one of the most iconic missing Bermuda Triangle wrecks.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team investigates a large wooden shipwreck that could be one of the Bermuda Triangle area's earliest victims: the long-lost SS D.H. Mount.

programme.desc: The harsh Labrador environment has a profound effect on the participants' mindset and their strategies, even proving too much for one participant to overcome.

programme.title: Tinik Sa Dibdib (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a searing drama about a young woman who got married to escape from her family of parasites only to find herself in a worse situation.

programme.title: Imortal (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Imortal refers to a love so great and so enduring, it defied conventions, tragedy and even the limitations of time.

programme.title: Darna (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Darna, the most beloved of Filipino superheroes, entered the era of the 90's as a quiet, bespectacled girl reporter. She defended the good against the many evil forces, which were lurking in the big city.

programme.title: Mahirap Maging Pogi
programme.desc: Perding Pogi (Andrew E.) is sought after by every woman in their neighborhood. Running away from all the girls who are dying to be his wife, he decides to look for his cousin Dodong Boogie (Dennis Padilla) in Manila.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Anino Ni Asedillo
programme.desc: The legacy of the legendary hero Asedillo (Fernando Poe, Jr.) lives on. A simple school teacher who fought for the rights of others at the cost of his life. Asedillo is the role model of Simon (Conrad Poe). He becomes an active union official in the factory he is working for to lobby for workers' rights.

programme.title: Magnong Rehas
programme.desc: Action star Raymart Santiago tackles the title role MAGNONG REHAS. Magno is a watch-your-car boy in love with a sales girl Abigail (Gelli de Belen). But Abigail's policeman uncle, Dado (Roi Vinzon) hates Magno's guts.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Bagwis Ng Lawin
programme.desc: Bagwis Ng Lawin

programme.title: Hulihin Si Nardong Toothpick
programme.desc: Nardo was a simple student cum bank janitor who was accidentally accused of murder and robbery. The truth was, while he really intended to rob the victim, he had a change of heart.

programme.title: Gaano Kadalas Ang Minsan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Vilma was a single mother. Her only son was dying of leukemia. His only desire was to meet his father. To grant his wish, Vilma entered into an arrangement with her best friend, Hilda.

programme.title: Kapantay ay Langit
programme.desc: Little Charina Scott played Cupid in this romantic comedy about a single mother finding another chance at love.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.desc: Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.desc: What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.desc: Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.desc: The guys hug it out with strangers in the park, go head-to-head pitching wacky inventions to confused consumers, and launch a manhunt for their imaginary wives.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4 3
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr paint themselves into a corner teaching an art class, face the dartboard of destiny at a local bar, and tonight's loser stresses out over a Joker home invasion.

programme.desc: While Phoebe delivers triplets, Joey experiences his own pain. Monica plans a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.desc: The gang discovers that Phoebe hates PBS after Joey agrees to help out with a pledge drive. Emily tells Ross she'll give him a second chance only if he cuts all ties with Rachel.

programme.desc: Ross tells Rachel that he cannot be around her once Emily comes to New York. Chandler and Monica try to have a romantic weekend.

programme.desc: Will Ross obey Emily and move away from his friends? Monica and Rachel meet a monster.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 5
programme.desc: They say blood is thicker than water, but family can put you through the wringer! See sibling squabbles, petty pranks and daring parental rescues.

programme.title: Caught! (Season 2) S2 6
programme.desc: Shopping trips are part of our daily routines, but if tensions flare between angry customers and fed-up workers, it can result in more than just damaged goods.

programme.title: Friends S5 7
programme.desc: After getting kicked out of his apartment, Ross moves in temporarily with Chandler and Joey, driving all three of them crazy.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 13
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke are having dinner in a hot tub… yup, it's exactly what you think. And it's a blast from the past as Kevin re-hacks a self-tanner. Plus, in the new Saved by the Hacks, our teens have let the hacks take over.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 14
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin learn ways to game the system with parking, and the Lazy Cook returns with a recipe for bringing old mac and cheese back to life. Plus, Senora is not the portrait of good behavior in a new Hacks Del Corazon.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 15
programme.desc: Brooke meets a dominatrix who wants to teach a pomegranate a lesson, and Mack and Jack try to help a new couple beat the cohabitation curse. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test a hack that puts your baby to work.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 16
programme.desc: Have Kevin and Brooke finally found the hacked pool of their dreams in "Hack or Wack"? And in "Hack Line of Defense," rude teenagers will no longer spoil the mood, thanks to hacks that will keep them on the straight and narrow.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 17
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke go dumpster-diving at the drive-thru in "Gaming the System," and Kevin is the hack hunter, as he meets with truckers to find some new everyday hacks. Plus, Señor Solución has a nasty fall on "Hacks Del Corazón."

programme.title: East New York S1 17
programme.desc: The 7-4 investigates the suspicious death of the patriarch of a neighborhood barbecue joint who has a close connection to Suarez. Also, Haywood receives an unexpected request from her father.

programme.title: East New York S1 18
programme.desc: The team’s investigation into a violent home invasion leads them to question one of their own.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 18
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke test hacks for fighting the urge to sprinkle a little tinkle. Plus, which host will be the victor for road trip hacks? And Nurse Hackie has the cure for itchy bites - if she can stay sober long enough to find it.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 19
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke find out that poo on the shoe isn't good luck, and Brooke tests some hacks for her pup. Plus, learn some hacks to go undercover when the Cold-Blooded Hacker tries to swipe some bling.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 20
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke test your hacks for smelly kitty litter, Kevin makes a flute out of a carrot in a new segment of Let's Make a Thing, and our Hack Line of Defense will have a testy bridezilla walking down the aisle in no time.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 21
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke bring back a failed lawnmower hack, but will it work this time? Plus, Kevin tests cheese-cutting hacks for your next charcuterie, and there's been a MURDER - murder mystery that is. Fortunately, Hack 911 is on the case.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 22
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test out a new toilet hack that will have you seeing in the dark, and Brooke has tips for hacking your dating profile. Plus, it's the shock of the season when Señor Solución finally meets his match, his mother-in-law.

programme.title: Arrow S2 18
programme.desc: When Frank Bertinelli is arrested, it's only a matter of time before his daughter, The Huntress, returns. When she takes hostages including Laurel, Sara (aka Canary) takes action.

programme.title: Arrow S2 19
programme.desc: Slade makes his move against Oliver - and the repercussions are enormous. While Oliver scrambles to protect his family, Isabel angles to take Queen Consolidated away from him.

programme.title: Arrow S2 20
programme.desc: Oliver and the team return to the lair and find Slade waiting for them. An epic battle breaks out and Oliver is faced with a choice - his battle with Slade or his family.

programme.title: Arrow S2 21
programme.desc: After the Mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city, Oliver realizes it's taken over completely, and he must figure out a way to stop him.

programme.title: Arrow S2 22

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 10 - Western Bulldogs v Essendon
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: First Weapons - Kodj
programme.desc: Phil Breslin joins weapon maker Larry Blight in Albany, WA, to discover the Kodj. Our experts unpack the science of this versatile weapon before Phil, Larry and a champion axeman face off in a showdown of speed and skill.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin - Episode 5
programme.desc: After another heist by the Kelly Gang, Jay pieces together their identities and uncovers their hideout. Anousha finds an unexpected detail of the police investigation into Josh's death and suddenly finds herself in danger.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 14

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman's ex-husband forces himself into her Arkansas home. While skating on a frozen river, a New Hampshire man falls through the ice into freezing water.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: Charlotte Murray Pace, an LSU graduate, is found raped and stabbed to death in her home. The brutality of the crime scene reminds police of the unsolved case of Gina Wilson Green.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: First-timers and frequent flyers get booked, including the son of a deputy who is charged with stealing a dog, and an intoxicated gentleman comes back to see his favourite policeman.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A man attempts a daring escape from court; a judge has to deal with a defendant's outburst; an inmate tries to have his attorney removed from his case.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A man attacks a defendant who's charged with the murder of his twin brother; a judge plays an ill-advised prank on an attorney; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man gets stuck in a chimney while trying to rob a house; pet store owners catch a thief with stolen snakes in his pants; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A bride and her caterer are accused of drugging the wedding guests; a woman climbs into the lion's den at The Bronx Zoo; Public outcry as an Alabama grandma is arrested for not paying her trash bill.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a man is shot on the side of the road, clues lead Detective Jason White to an ongoing crime spree in his 100th case for Tulsa Homicide.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Chaos ensues in both the men's and the women's pods, leaving Sheriff Dance concerned with the state of the program.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: La Suisse Des Lacs
programme.desc: The Trois-Lacs-Jura region and its Lakes Bienne, Morat and Neuchâtel; Lake Maggiore, between Switzerland and Italy; Lakes Zurich, Brienz and Thoune in the Bernese Oberland... In summer, water attracts all with an unconditional love of their country's lakes.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Dj Battle Africa - La Finale
programme.desc: The fourth battle and the last qualifying spot for the semi-finals. The Ivorian DJ Jyll'k is up against the Moroccan DJ Amine Psy One.

programme.title: Meurtres Sur La Côte Bleue
programme.desc: Chloé Soldani, a young police inspector, is temporarily transferred to Provence to be closer to her mother. Working as a team with Lino Perrin, she is investigating a murder. The only witness to the murder is the lover of Chloé's mother, who seems intent on concealing key information.
